parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename to which to save the settings ( *.sldreg )

parameters.name: SystemOptions
parameters.description: True to save system options, false to not

parameters.name: ToolbarLayout
parameters.description: Toolbar layout as defined in swToolbarLayoutOption_e

parameters.name: KeyboardShortcuts
parameters.description: True to save keyboard shortcuts, false to not

parameters.name: MouseGestures
parameters.description: True to save mouse gestures, false to not

parameters.name: MenuCustomization
parameters.description: True to save menu customizations, false to not

parameters.name: SavedViews
parameters.description: True to save views, false to not

title: ISldWorks.SaveSettings
description: Saves the specified SOLIDWORKS settings to the specified *.sldreg file.
signature:
System.Int32 SaveSettings( 
   System.String
FileName
,
   System.Boolean
SystemOptions
,
   System.Int32
ToolbarLayout
,
   System.Boolean
KeyboardShortcuts
,
   System.Boolean
MouseGestures
,
   System.Boolean
MenuCustomization
,
   System.Boolean
SavedViews
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename to which to save the settings ( *.sldreg )

parameters.name: SystemOptions
parameters.description: True to save system options, false to not

parameters.name: ToolbarLayout
parameters.description: Toolbar layout as defined in swToolbarLayoutOption_e

parameters.name: KeyboardShortcuts
parameters.description: True to save keyboard shortcuts, false to not

parameters.name: MouseGestures
parameters.description: True to save mouse gestures, false to not

parameters.name: MenuCustomization
parameters.description: True to save menu customizations, false to not

parameters.name: SavedViews
parameters.description: True to save views, false to not

returns: Error code as defined in swSaveRestoreSettingsResults_e
remarks: For C++ only, specify all System.bool parameters using VARIANT_TRUE (-1) and VARIANT_FALSE (0).
